item.title: Azure CLI - List Locations and Peers
item.description: How to use the Azure CLI to list Azure Locations and their peers So this will be a “quick post” that shows some great functionality within the Azure CLI with az account list-locations.

item.title: Expiring Keys and Secrets within Azure Key Vault
item.description: I was working with a customer the other day and a fairly simple ask came up, I however could not find an immediate answer within the portal.
